data.name: Games of Glory - "Byorn Pack"
data.detailed_description:
The Byorn pack contains Byorn, Clone, and 450 Soldi -- enough to buy the accessory of your choice. It's everything you need to get started in your new role as the team's Battle Medic!

Byorn is the Synarch's guard's most talented medic. The native Svandian's gift for healing has allowed him to rise in the ranks of society despite his lower middle class origins. When teammates take a hit, he always finds a way to pick up the pieces – literally.

  • Tactical Link
    Byorn delploys a link that increases allies' attack speed or decreases that of enemies. Reactivated, he will switch positions with the target
  • Medpacks
    Byorn throws a medpack to heal himself or his weakest ally
  • Impregnable Barrier
    Byorn deploys a shield area to protect himself and nearby alliest

Your teammates will thank you for being a Byorn!

data.short_description: The Byorn pack contains Byorn, Clone, and 450 Soldi -- enough to buy the accessory of your choice. It's everything you need to get started in your new role as the team's Battle Medic!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP +
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set suppor4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: dx9 (shader model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
